solution_line_template: This means that Tamara has saved {nora_savings}/{tamara_divisor} = <<{nora_savings}/{tamara_divisor}={tamara_savings}>>{tamara_savings} dollars
All together, they have saved {nora_savings} + {tamara_savings} + {lulu_savings} = <<{nora_savings}+{tamara_savings}+{lulu_savings}={total_savings}>>{total_savings} dollars
If they pay off the debt they will remain with {total_savings} - {debt_amount} = <<{total_savings}-{debt_amount}={remaining_money_after_debt}>>{remaining_money_after_debt} dollars
Dividing the remaining money equally will give each girl {remaining_money_after_debt}/{number_of_girls} = <<{remaining_money_after_debt}/{number_of_girls}={money_per_girl}>>{money_per_girl} dollars.
